name: Dhelve
description:
Brave the depths of a procedurally generated dungeon and gather gold to buy supplies which will aid you in your journey.

Controls

WASD - Movement controls

E - Used to interact with objects such as the shop or ladders

      Ladders are used to leave the current dungeon

1,2,3,4 - use items in the respective hotbar slot

Space or LMB - attack

Tab - open the Stats Screen

M - toggle the minimap

M to toggle the minimap
